appDescription: Your personal study tracker for the 2027 A/L exam.
aiStudyCoachDescription: Your personal AI assistant for smarter studying.
logActivityDescription: Select a subject, then log your study time or add a to-do task.
subjectDetailsDescription: View your total hours and to-do lists for each subject.
noTasksYet: No tasks yet. Add one in the logger!
logHoursForTaskDescription: How many hours did you spend on "{taskText}"?
weeklyGoalsDescription: Track your progress towards your weekly study hour goals.
noHoursLogged: Log some hours to see the chart.
chatDescription: Try asking: "What are my to-do items for chemistry?"
noMessagesYet: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
signInPrompt: Please enter your details to sign in.
selectStreamDescription: This helps us personalize your dashboard. You only need to do this once.
createAccountDescription: Join to start tracking your studies for the A/L 2027 exam.
toastInvalidHours: Please select a subject and enter a positive number for hours.
toastInvalidTask: Please select a subject and enter a task description.
toastMustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to generate goals.
toastStreamNotFound: Could not determine study stream. Please refresh.
toastAIGoalsUpdated: Your weekly study goals have been updated by the AI.
toastCouldNotLoadData: Could not load study data. Please try refreshing the page.
motivationCardInitialMessage: Log some study hours or add a to-do task to get your first analysis from the AI Study Coach!
motivationCardInitialSpotlight: Select a subject in the 'Log Your Study Activity' card to get started.
welcomeNewUserStream: We've created a new account for you in the {stream} stream.
googleSignInError: Could not sign in with Google. Please try again.
accountCreatedSuccess: Welcome! You'll be redirected to your dashboard.
allTasksCleared: All your to-do items have been cleared.
tasksForSubjectDeleted: All tasks for {subjectName} have been deleted.
